column1: A memorial service will be held at 2:00 pm on Tuesday
column3: inside the Gymnasium of SouthWest Edgecombe High School in Pinetops with Pastor Jay Thompson officiating.  The family will receive friends and relatives inside the Gymnasium at SouthWest Edgecombe High School from 12:00 until 2:00 pm; and other times at the home: 64 Rollinwood Dr.
